chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall z : Z, Zodd z -> rel_prime 2 z

Premises:
rel_prime = fun a b : Z => Zis_gcd a b 1 : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments rel_prime (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
Zodd = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end : Z -> Prop Arguments Zodd _%Z_scope
Zodd_def2 : forall z : Z, (exists k : Z, z = 2 * k + 1) -> Zodd z
Zodd_def1 : forall z : Z, Zodd z -> exists k : Z, z = 2 * k + 1
Zeven_def1 : forall z : Z, Zeven z -> exists k : Z, z = 2 * k
Zeven_def2 : forall z : Z, (exists k : Z, z = 2 * k) -> Zeven z
Zodd_sqr1 : forall z : Z, Zodd z -> Zodd (z * z)
Zodd_equiv : forall z : Z, Zodd z < -> Z.Odd z
Zmult_eq_reg_l : forall z z1 z2 : Z, z * z1 = z * z2 -> z <> 0 -> z1 = z2
OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, 0 <= x -> y = 0 -> 0 <= x + y * z
Z_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall p : positive, P (Z.pos p)) -> (forall p : positive, P (Z.neg p)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z.divide = fun x y : Z => exists z : Z, y = z * x : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.divide (_ _)%Z_scope
OMEGA20 : forall x y z : Z, Zne x 0 -> y = 0 -> Zne (x + y * z) 0
OMEGA17 : forall x y z : Z, Zne x 0 -> y = 0 -> Zne (x + y * z) 0
Zgcd_spec : forall x y : Z, {z : Z | Zis_gcd x y z /\ 0 <= z}
gcd2_relp_odd : forall u v : Z, Zodd u -> Zodd v -> rel_prime u v -> Zis_gcd (u - v) (u + v) 2
get_signZ = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.neg p => Some (Z.pos p) | _ => None end : Z -> option Z Arguments get_signZ _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.even = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => true | _ => false end : Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.even _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.sgn = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos _ => 1 | Z.neg _ => -1 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.sgn _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.odd = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => false | _ => true end : Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.odd _%Z_scope
Zeven = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => True | _ => False end : Z -> Prop Arguments Zeven _%Z_scope
Zodd_sum3 : forall a b : Z, Zodd (a + 2 * b) -> Zodd a
Zodd_ex : forall n : Z, Zodd n -> exists m : Z, n = 2 * m + 1
Zodd_div2 : forall n : Z, Zodd n -> n = 2 * Z.div2 n + 1
BinIntDef.Z.div2 = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.pos ((_~1)%positive as p) | Z.pos ((_~0)%positive as p) => Z.pos (Pos.div2 p) | Z.neg p => Z.neg (Pos.div2_up p) | _ => 0 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.div2 _%Z_scope
Zodd_quot2 : forall n : Z, n >= 0 -> Zodd n -> n = 2 * Z.quot2 n + 1
Zodd_quot2_neg : forall n : Z, n <= 0 -> Zodd n -> n = 2 * Z.quot2 n - 1
gcd2_rel_prime : forall a b s w : Z, Zis_gcd a b 2 -> a = 4 * s -> b = 2 * w -> rel_prime s w
BinIntDef.Z.quot2 = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.pos ((_~1)%positive as p) | Z.pos ((_~0)%positive as p) => Z.pos (Pos.div2 p) | Z.neg ((_~1)%positive as p) | Z.neg ((_~0)%positive as p) => Z.neg (Pos.div2 p) | _ => 0 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.quot2 _%Z_scope
Zodd_ex_iff : forall n : Z, Zodd n < -> (exists m : Z, n = 2 * m + 1)
Zodd_mult_Zodd : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zodd (a * b)
Zodd_opp1 : forall a : Z, Zodd (- a) -> Zodd a

```coq
intros z H.
apply Zodd_def1 in H.
destruct H as [k Hk].
unfold rel_prime.
rewrite Hk.
exists 1.
split.
- unfold Zis_gcd.
  split.
  + exists (1 - k). ring.
  + exists (-1). ring.
- apply Zgcd_spec.
Qed.
```

original: intros z H. apply Zodd_def1 in H. destruct H as [k Hk]. unfold rel_prime. rewrite Hk. exists 1. split. - unfold Zis_gcd. split. + exists (1 - k). ring. + exists (-1). ring. - apply Zgcd_spec.
